articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction site of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station.
					 Kim Jong Un said he recollected with deep emotion leader Kim Jong Il while making a journey to the construction site of the power station, adding he felt painful at the thought that Kim Jong Il attached so great importance to the construction of the power station that he made a trip along a steep mountain path to visit it though he was not in a good condition right after his foreign tour. He noted that the longer he traveled along the road covered by Kim Jong Il, the more keenly he realized that there was no such leader in the world as him. 
					
					 He said he came to the power station to call on the members of the youth shock brigade to complete as early as possible the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, the legacy left by Kim Jong Il and structure associated with his loving care and the eternal treasure of the country.
					
					 After being briefed on the power station in front of the map showing its panoramic view, he went round different places of the construction site to learn in detail about the progress made in the project and the living of the members of the shock brigade. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the youth shock brigade have pushed forward the project in a three dimensional manner as evidenced by the successes made in pressing ahead with the construction of the waterway tunnel of Power Station No. 2 at a final phase after completing the construction of its sand and stone dam, while hastening the concrete dam project of Power Station No. 1, the main project, despite unfavorable conditions.
					
					 "Though they are undertaking such huge power station project for the first time, they are performing miracles and feats in the construction as they are members of the youth shock brigade who have the intense loyalty to uphold the cause of the party and the leader in practice and enthusiasm to make a positive contribution to settling the shortage of electricity in the country", he noted.
					
					 He said that the power station is of great importance in improving the people's standard of living and resolving the economic issue in Ryanggang Province which has Samjiyon County where the birthplace of Kim Jong Il and revolutionary battle sites are located, calling for unconditionally completing Power Stations Nos. 1 and 2 till the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 "Patriotism being displayed by the members of the youth shock brigade in the construction site of the power station clearly proves that our country is a power of youth without an equal in the world", he said, highly praising their feats as a historical term.
					
					 Noting that there are great many monumental structures going by the name of youth in various parts of the country, he ardently called for carrying forward the shining tradition established by the Korean youth in their efforts to achieve the prosperity of the socialist motherland and building the station, the eternal treasure of the country to be handed down to posterity, on the land of Paektu by working hard in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and thus implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il without fail.
					
					 He said that the faster the youth go, the more rapid advance the country makes, adding that the party reposes deep trust in the youth, and that it is the determination and will of the Party Central Committee to let the youth put up a nameplate at the gate of a thriving nation ahead of others.
					
					 And he told officials to inform once again the members of the youth shock brigade of  the fact that the party entirely entrusted to them the construction of the power station to which the party attaches importance with a firm resolution.
					
					 He called for winding up the construction project till the 70th anniversary of the WPK to demonstrate before the whole world that the 70 year-long history of the party is the history of attaching importance to the youth and the history of building a power of youth.
					
					 Proposing the presentation of a great chorus of young people there with the joy at finishing the project, he promised to surely watch it and have a photo taken in front of the station that day.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Jae Il and Jon Yong Nam.

articles.title: Reception Given by DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Reception Given by DPRK Foreign Ministry
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry gave a reception on Monday on the occasions of the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 50th anniversary of the naming of a beautiful flower Kimilsungia.
					 Present there on invitation were charge d'affaires ad interim Bambang Purwanto and staff members of the Indonesian embassy and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and officials of the Foreign Ministry were present there.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said in a speech that the Indonesia visit paid by the President and Kim Jong Il was a historic one which injected new life into the anti-imperialist independent forces and the people of developing countries in their struggle to put an end to the imperialists' colonial domination and achieve national independence and sovereignty.
					
					 Immortal flower Kimilsungia which came into being as the flower praising the great man is now in full bloom as a symbol of the friendship between the peoples of the two countries and the world progressives' invariable reverence and praise of the President, he noted.
					
					 Bambang Purwanto said in a speech recalled that President Sukarno presented the newly bred beautiful flower to President Kim Il Sung and named it Kimilsungia when he was visiting Indonesia in April 1965.
					
					 He noted that not only the Korean people but the Indonesians and other people of the world are commemorating the Indonesia visit of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Indonesian and Korean people will as ever boost the good ties of friendship which were forged and have been carried forward for decades under the care of the leaders of the two countries, he added.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were present there.
					
					 The ambassador said in a speech that the great career of the President is a model for not only the Korean people but the world revolutionary people, adding: The Cuban people will always remember the feats the President performed for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Cuban people watch with admiration the reality of the DPRK making great progress under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in a speech: It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to consolidate the bonds of militant friendship and solidarity with Cuba associated with the noble feats of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever always stand in the same trench with the fraternal Cuban people in the common struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism.

articles.title: KPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
KPA Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean People's Army (KPA) led by KPA Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, returned home on Monday after taking part in the seminar on global security held in Moscow.

articles.title: Delegations of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea Fly Back
articles.content:
Delegations of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea Fly Back
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, a delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, a delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, a delegation of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK and a representative of the Irish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea flew back on Monday. 
					 Departing earlier were a delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, a Japanese delegation for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and a delegation of the Mongolian organization for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Federal Secretary of Left Bloc of Austrian Trade Union Federation Leaves
articles.content:
Federal Secretary of Left Bloc of Austrian Trade Union Federation Leaves
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, and his party left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Chongjin, April 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port, North Hamgyong Province on Monday on the occasion of the 83rd anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leone-flagged ship Ha I Heng-1.
					
					 Speakers praised the President as the iron-willed commander and legendary hero who waged protracted bloody battles against the brigandish Japanese imperialists under the banner of the anti-Japanese struggle and liberated Korea, led to victory the war fought against the U.S. imperialists' invasion, thus defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation.
					
					 They lauded Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun who built the DPRK into the world-class military power. 
					
					 The feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the army building will go down in history along with the flow of the times, they noted.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Festival Closes
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Festival Closes
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The 17th Kimilsungia Festival closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Monday.
					 The festival drew hundreds of thousands of service personnel of the People's Army, working people, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreign guests as it presented fantastic scenery with Kimilsungias.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, members of the societies for disseminating and supporting immortal flowers, working people, school youth and children in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and foreign guests.
					
					 Certificates of the Kimilsungia festival were awarded to many units which were highly estimated at the festival, members who contributed to the festival, exemplary cultivators, former unconverted long-term prisoners and other participants.
					
					 The certificates were conferred on the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the Indonesian embassy here, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 The certificates of the participation in the festival went to working people and school youth and children.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia festival organizing committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: 17th Kimilsungia Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
17th Kimilsungia Festival in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- On display at the 17th Kimilsungia Festival in the DPRK were a large number of potted Kimilsungias cultivated by local and world people with their deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
					 Ha Sin Guk, director of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, told KCNA that the festival for this year was of weighty significance as it took place with the 50th anniversary of the naming of Kimilsungia as an occasion.
					
					 The Indonesian embassy to the DPRK prepared its exhibition stand of Kimilsungias with a photo of President Sukarno presenting Kimilsungia to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Displayed at an exhibition stand of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps were more than 50 potted Kimilsungias cultivated by over 30 missions of countries and international organizations.
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes in the festival were potted Kimilsungias presented on behalf of the presidents of Laos, Syria and Palestine.
					
					 Also taking part in the festival were more than 40 friendship and solidarity organizations and personages of different countries, including the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the chairman of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Myriads of Kimilsungias exhibited at the festival showed that President Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of the world people.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- New posters have been produced to encourage the service personnel and people in the drive to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint slogans of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea which were published on the occasion of the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK.
					 Posters "Let Us All Implement Joint Slogans!" and "Let Us All Advance towards Square of Victory!" ardently call upon all officials, party members and other people proudly enter the square of victory with shining gifts.
					
					 Other posters reflect the pledge of all service personnel and people to thoroughly carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, united close around the party.
					
					 There are also posters dealing with the will of all service personnel and people to resolutely shatter the frantic "human rights" racket of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Twin Sisters, Talented Marathoners of DPRK
articles.content:
Twin Sisters, Talented Marathoners of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Hye Song, a marathoner of the Pyongyang Sports Team in the DPRK, placed first at the marathon race held in Pyongyang some days ago to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 She is an elder sister of Kim Hye Gyong, a marathoner of the same sports team, who proved successful in national and international games. They are twin sisters born in Sariwon, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Kim Hye Gyong came first in the half marathon of the 2013 Singapore Women's Race and Kim Hye Song second. The twin sisters also took the first and second places in the first-class race of the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon.
					
					 Kim Hye Gyong won gold medals at the 15th Asian Marathon Championship and the 2015 Hong Kong Marathon.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA in a training field, Kim Hye Song said that she would live up to the expectation of the country and people with good results in tournaments.

articles.title: New Kind of Kiln Proves Effective in Local Factory
articles.content:
New Kind of Kiln Proves Effective in Local Factory
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Kyongsong Insulator Factory in North Hamgyong Province in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has sharply increased the production of insulators by replacing the existing kiln with high-temperature air-combustion one.
					 The newly introduced kiln is considered to be of high economic value.
					
					 The new kind of kiln makes it possible to produce 1.6 times more insulators than existing one, using 40 percent less coal.
					
					 Meanwhile, it helps completely ensure the quality of products.

articles.title: Korean Industrial Art Studio 60 Years Old
articles.content:
Korean Industrial Art Studio 60 Years Old
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean Industrial Art Studio observed its diamond jubilee.
					 President Kim Il Sung established it on April 18, Juche 44 (1955), clearly indicated the way to be followed by it and wisely led the work to develop the nation's industrial art.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il took revolutionary steps to develop the Juche-based industrial art. He personally examined industrial art designs one by one till they were perfected and led officials and creators to effect uninterrupted innovations in design creation.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) indicated the principles and ways to be consistently adhered to in developing the industrial art as required by the new century and energetically led the work to bring a new turn in creating industrial art.
					
					 The officials and creators of the studio have successfully created hundreds of thousands of designs in the past period, contributing to giving wide publicity to the greatness of the party and the leader, stepping up economic construction and improving the standard of the people's living.
					
					 The studio has developed into the nation's reliable industrial art production center staffed with able industrial artists and having a firm material and technological foundation. It was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of National Flag First Class.
					
					 The WPK Central Committee sent a congratulatory message to the officials and creators of the studio on its diamond jubilee.
					
					 A meeting took place on Monday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 30th anniversary of publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Further Improvement of the Health Service". 
					 The work, published on Apr. 21, Juche 74 (1985), enunciates the idea that the essence of socialist health service is an honorable and worthwhile revolutionary work to protect lives of people and improve their health.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for developing socialist healthcare system by thoroughly carrying out the party's policy for preventive medicine and improving medical service and ways to do so and principled matters arising in further developing medical science and technology, improving the training of health workers, ensuring material supply to public health and strengthening the guidance to it and ways to do so. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Thae Bok, Han Kwang Bok, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, and officials of public health and those in the fields of medical science and education in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, said in a report: Kim Jong Il clarified in a unique manner the essence of socialist public health. This was a precious ideological and theoretical feat as he newly formulated the basic principle providing a starting point for the development of Juche-oriented public health and indicated the way for the party and state how to develop healthcare in socialist society. 
					
					 He referred to the big successes achieved in public health for the past three decades since the publication of the work.
					
					 A signal change has taken place in the ideological and moral traits of the health workers, driving force in public health, popular healthcare policies have been enforced without interruption despite stern ordeals and the best Korean-style socialist healthcare system has been consolidated, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 A lot of modern healthcare institutions and entertainment facilities for the promotion of health of people and children have sprung up across the country and a fresh turn taken place in healthcare. 
					
					 The reporter called for giving fuller play to the advantages of the socialist healthcare system in the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese Bodies Slam Authorities for Their Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Bodies Slam Authorities for Their Suppression of Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations issued statements on March 30 and April 1 to denounce the authorities for their suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Hokkaido People's Council for Japan-Korea Solidarity said that the Japanese police authorities' violence against the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee is censured worldwide as it reminds one of the suppression of Koreans in the 20th century.
					
					 It called upon the forces aspiring after peace and democracy to get united as one in the struggle so that such violence may not be repeated.
					
					 The Hyogo Prefectural People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship said that the Abe regime is seeking a war, far from making an apology and reparation for the past colonial rule, and to this end, it is talking much about the "threat from the DPRK" and resorting to the suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 In order to achieve the peace and stability in Northeast Asia, it is essential to establish the diplomatic relations between Japan and the DPRK and form friendly relations at an early date, the statement said, adding: Unpardonable is the attitude of the present regime going against this.
					
					 The Yamaguchi Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship and Solidarity said the Japanese government is to blame for this situation as it is evading an apology and reparation for the past crimes till today, nearly 70 years since the war, adding this brings disgrace on the Japanese people.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Slam Japanese Government for Its Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Slam Japanese Government for Its Suppression of Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in an open letter to Japanese Prime Minister Abe on April 8 denounced the Japanese government for cracking down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The news of the Japanese police authorities' recent search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee without any legitimate procedure greatly shocked and angered the Koreans in the U.S., the letter said. 
					
					 Chongryon is playing the role of the DPRK diplomatic mission in the absence of the diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities' human rights abuses against officials of Chongryon are further deteriorating the relations between the two countries.
					
					 Chongryon is the only organization speaking for and protecting the Koreans who were forcibly taken to Japan by the Japanese imperialists in the past, and their descendants. The Japanese authorities' search fully revealed the bitter hostility toward the Korean nation.
					
					 The letter demanded the Japanese prime minister personally make an apology for the illegal crackdown on Chongryon and take measures to prevent its recurrence.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Condemn Japan's Distortion of History
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Condemn Japan's Distortion of History
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Liaison Society of Korean University Students in Japan against Japan's Distortion of History visited the Osaka City Office, Japan on March 27 and staged a protest against the Japanese government's distortion of history.
					 They strongly denounced the city authorities for trying to evacuate the Osaka human rights museum in the wake of the Osaka city authorities' stop to payment of educational subsidies pursuant to the Japanese government's policy of discriminating against the Korean schools and the Osaka mayor's reckless remarks on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 They stressed that all these moves are intolerable as they are pushed forward as part of Japan's acts of tampering with history.

articles.title: S. Korean People Will Bring Final End to Traitorous Regime: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean People Will Bring Final End to Traitorous Regime: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- 55 years ago there was the April popular uprising in south Korea that ruined the Syngman Rhee traitorous regime.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The April popular uprising was the eruption of the pent-up grudge and anger of the popular masses under the colonial rule by the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for 15 years after Korea's liberation. It was the popular resistance against the U.S. and fascism, involving millions of people across south Korea.
					
					 Over half a century has passed since then, but the desire of the uprisers has not yet come true. This is entirely ascribable to the U.S. domination and interference in south Korea and to the traitorous moves of the pro-U.S. conservative forces.
					
					 South Korea turns back to the past period of "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The present puppet chief executive earns ill fame as a heinous dictator as she lends a deaf ear to the voices of the people and pursues treacherous policies with arrogance and self-importance.
					
					 Confrontation, tension and danger of a nuclear war have escalated for over two years since the present ruling forces took office. 
					
					 The prevailing situation calls upon the people of all social strata in south Korea to launch massive actions for wiping out outsiders and traitors by inheriting the soul of the April popular uprisers. 
					
					 The south Korean people will surely bring a final ruin to the reactionaries of history going against the times and nation through popular resistance for independence against the U.S., for democracy against dictatorship and for national reunification.

articles.title: Dynamic Actions for Probing Truth into Ferry Sewol Disaster Declared
articles.content:
Dynamic Actions for Probing Truth into Ferry Sewol Disaster Declared
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea in a statement on April 16 expressed the will to take more dynamic action for probing the truth about ferry Sewol disaster on the lapse of one year since the disaster.
					 The statement denounced the regime for pressurizing the bereaved families and other people to give up the probe into the truth about the disaster.
					
					 The solidarity will fight to have the regime's "enforcement ordinance" abolished and salvage the ferry, the statement noted.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Term Park Geun Hye Arch Criminal of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Term Park Geun Hye Arch Criminal of Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a commentary on April 16 denounced Park Geun Hye of south Korea as the arch criminal of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 If Park had the will, the truth about the disaster would have been probed, the commentary said.
					
					 The people assert that the truth about the disaster will be probed properly if Park is resigned, it noted.
					
					 The people's human rights cannot be guaranteed as long as Park holds the post of "president", it said.

articles.title: Trade Union of University Hospital in S. Korea to Launch General Strike
articles.content:
Trade Union of University Hospital in S. Korea to Launch General Strike
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The trade union of the hospital of Seoul National University in south Korea declared that it would launch a general strike from Thursday, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The union recalled that it held negotiations with the hospital side in demand of wage hike and better treatment for workers but nothing was settled. It added: If the hospital side fails to retract its unilateral plan to revise the employment regulations for the worse, we will launch a strike.

articles.title: S. Korean Labor Body Denounces Ruling Quarters' Heinous Scandal
articles.content:
S. Korean Labor Body Denounces Ruling Quarters' Heinous Scandal
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on April 15 to denounce the puppet ruling group's heinous scandal. The statement said:
					 Before committing suicide, Song Wan Jong, former chairman of the Kyongnam Business Group exposed the ruling forces received illegal political funds. This stupendous case proves that the emergence of the Park Geun Hye regime was a political disaster.
					
					 The Park regime came into being through extensive interference in the election by the power organs.
					
					 When the scandal was exposed one year since the ferry Sewol disaster, Park ran away under the pretence of foreign tour.
					
					 Those involved in the scandal did not admit their criminal act but the truth about the crimes is becoming clearer day by day.
					
					 The present chief executive is to totally blame for the scandal.
					
					 The statement called upon the workers to stage a general strike to force the Park regime to step down.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Censures Puppet Chief Executive
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Censures Puppet Chief Executive
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Solidarity in south Korea issued a statement on April 16 one year since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 It was none other than the chief executive who dampened the desire of the bereaved families and other people for building a safe society since the disaster, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The bereaved families gave up a memorial service while awaiting a response to the demand for abolition of the enforcement ordinance and salvage of the ferry Sewol. Their tears have turned into resentment.  The people have no alternative but to abandon the "president" as she betrayed them. She is not entitled to stay in office as she blocked the probe into the truth about the disaster and shifted the responsibility for building a safe society onto the people.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Spanish Political Party
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Spanish Political Party
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The historic Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" was signed by the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain on April 13.
					 Signing the declaration on behalf of the party, its general secretary said that the members of the Party Central Committee fully support inking the declaration for the advance and development of the socialist cause.
					
					 I deem it an honor to sign the declaration on behalf of the party in the period of celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung who made a great contribution to the socialist cause, the general secretary noted, adding:
					
					 Our party will remain loyal to the socialist principles and internationalism, bearing in mind the duty and the mission of the party which signed the declaration.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Political Party
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a statement on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 103rd birth anniversary of the great leader President Kim Il Sung we extend warm congratulations to the Korean people in their efforts to implement his behests.
					
					 He defeated the Japanese imperialists, liberated the country, defended the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. imperialists' invasion and built genuine socialism in the country, providing the Korean people with the cradle of happy life.
					
					 He made immortal contributions to strengthening the non-aligned movement and promoting the cause of the world progressive people for independence against imperialism.
					
					 The feats he performed will shine long as he devoted his all to the victory of the cause of Juche and Songun, the country and its people and the cause of global independence after embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Sweden, Uganda and Nigeria between April 9 and 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary career and undying feats of the President and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to win the final victory.
					
					 Films shown included a Korean film "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun".
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il before paying highest tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association praised the President as the founding-father of socialist Korea and the distinguished leader who energetically steered the struggle of the progressive people for independence.
					
					 At the events in Uganda speakers lauded the President as the iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and the world elder statesman who devoted his all to accomplishing the human cause of independence, adding that he will always be alive in the hearts of mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy said that the tender-hearted image of the President as the father of the people will always be cherished in the hearts of progressive mankind.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Sweden and Nigeria.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Ecuador, Demark and Laos on April 6 and 8 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos documenting the undying feats of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, books on their greatness and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Attending there were personages of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the Committee for External Affairs of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the Laos-Korea Friendship Association and other masses.
					
					 Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, said that the history of world politics knows many famous politicians but knows no such outstanding thinker and theoretician and great leader as the President who recorded the whole course of leading the revolution as the glorious annals.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, co-chairman of the Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, noted that the President energetically led the world socialist movement under the unfurled banner of socialism, adding: The feats he performed will shine long together with the cause of independence dynamically advancing.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Denmark.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" was brought out in booklet by the German branch of the Korean Friendship Association.
					 The work, made public on October 16, Juche 83 (1994), indicates the tasks and ways of preserving the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and accomplishing it, including the issue of consolidating the party and strengthening the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses, the issue of thoroughly carrying out the party's revolutionary economic strategy and the issue of strengthening the People's Army and establishing the social trait of attaching importance to military affairs.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place on April 11.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house of Algeria.
					 The speech made by him at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on April 12.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Shows Held Abroad
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia shows took place in Russia, Guinea and China from April 8 to 15 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 50th anniversary of the naming of the immortal flower Kimilsungia.
					 The venues of the shows presented fantastic scenery with Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias. Displayed there were photos dealing with revolutionary feats of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were photos of diplomas and medals those immortal flowers were awarded at international expos and shows, and books.
					
					 The opening ceremonies of the shows were attended by personages from all walks of life and citizens in relevant countries, and members of DPRK missions there and officials concerned.
					
					 The first vice mayor of Nakhodka City, Russia said that the President turned the DPRK into a socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense and made a great contribution to boosting the friendly relations between the two countries by providing a cornerstone for the Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The mayor of Partizansk City, Russia said that the birth anniversary of the President is the greatest holiday of the Korean nation as he liberated Korea and paved the road to the new development and prosperity.
					
					 The secretary general of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association said Kimilsungia is the most famous flower recognized by the world and a treasure common to mankind.
					
					 The director general and the general manager of Chinese companies said that they are pleased to hold shows on the above-said occasions. They hoped that the Korean people would register greater successes in the building of an economic power under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Grand Monumental Edifices Introduced by Organizations of Brazil, Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Grand Monumental Edifices Introduced by Organizations of Brazil, Germany
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Germany posted on their websites on April 7 and 12 articles introducing grand monumental edifices of the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK said that one can see a torch on a big tower erected on the bank of the River Taedong, Pyongyang. That is the torch of the Tower of the Juche Idea, it said, introducing in detail the scale, form and symbolic meaning of the tower.
					
					 Many people of the world visit the tower, it added.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in an article said that Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, waged the bloody anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle for 20 years and liberated the country. He exchanged greetings with the people in the homeland at the public playground in Pyongyang on October 14, Juche 34 (1945) and made a speech on his triumphant return to the homeland, it noted.
					
					 On the occasion of the 70th birthday of the President, leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the Arch of Triumph was built at the foot of Moran Hill where the President made a historic speech, it said, adding:
					
					 The Arch of Triumph, a grand monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party, will convey down through generations the undying feats the President performed by liberating Korea.

articles.title: Egyptian Political Party Denounces U.S. for Trying to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Party Denounces U.S. for Trying to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt released a statement on April 8 to denounce the U.S. for trying to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea are a provocation aimed to disturb the world security and peace in disregard of the international community. And it seeks a cynical ploy to escalate tension on the Korean peninsula in a bid to ignite a war in this region.
					
					 Such foolish moves will bring nothing but disgrace and ruin to the U.S.
					
					 We, standing on the same trench with the Korean people, denounce the UN for blindly following the U.S. war strategy against the DPRK, and the south Korean puppet forces for serving the U.S., pressurized by high-handed practices and threats.

articles.title: Egyptian Political Party Denounces U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Party Denounces U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt issued a statement on April 6 to denounce the U.S. and its followers for their "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. and its followers under the mask of "protection of human rights" committed such hostile act of railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" cooked up by them through the 28th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council. The statement went on:
					
					 The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt bitterly denounces and rejects the U.S. and its followers' hostile policy toward the DPRK and urges them to stop the "human rights" racket against it.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer interfere in the internal affairs of other countries while styling itself a "human rights judge" but set right the human rights situation in the U.S. which is denounced by the world as tundra of human rights.
					
					 Japan and some EU countries should not behave impudently while following the U.S. but improve their tarnished image in the international community.
					
					 The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt condemns the U.S. base attempt and demands together with the world peace-loving people the U.S. halt such acts at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Songun de Paektusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Songun de Paektusan
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Songun Paektusan.
					El Mariscal dijo que yendo alli recordo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien acudio primero al campo de construccion de regreso de su visita al extranjero aunque se sentia mal, y agrego que no existe en el mundo tal hombre como el Dirigente.
					
					Subrayo que vino al campo de construccion para exhortar a los brigadistas juveniles a terminar lo mas pronto posible la obra de la central, herencia, fuente de amor y tesoro eterno de la patria dejados por el Dirigente.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano panoramico, el Mariscal hizo detallado conocimiento de la marcha de la obra y la vida de los brigadistas.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los miembros de la brigada juvenil Songun Paektusan, al acelerar superando las desfavorables condiciones la obra de dique de hormigon de la central no.1, principal objeto de construccion, terminaron totalmente la construccion de pedraplen de la central no.2 y esta en etapa final la construccion del tunel de agua, desarrollando asi la obra de modo tridimensional.
					
					Subrayo que los brigadistas crean milagros y proezas aunque son novatos en la construccion de la central de gran tamano, con la firme decision de apoyar con practicas la causa del partido y el lider y con el entusiasmo de solucionar el problema de electricidad del pais.
					
					Al referir que la central tiene gran importancia en la mejora de vida del pueblo y la solucion de los problemas economicos de la provincia de Ryanggang, en que estan situado el distrito de Samjiyon, distrito natal del Dirigente y los lugares de batalla revolucionaria, exhorto a terminar las centrales no.1 y 2 hasta el dia del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC (10 de octubre).
					
					Destaco que el patriotismo de los brigadistas juveniles en el campo de construccion, demuestra sin reserva que nuestro pais es la unica potencia de jovenes en el mundo y aprecio su proeza como nuevo vocablo de la epoca.
					
					Apunto que por doquier de nuestro pais hay muchas obras monumentales que llevan el nombre de la juventud y exhorto fervientemente a materializar sin falta el legado del Dirigente, al levantar en la zona del Paektu los bienes eternos de la patria, continuando la orgullosa tradicion de los jovenes coreanos creada en el esfuerzo por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y izando la vela al viento cortante del monte Paektu.
					
					Subrayo que la velocidad del paso de los jovenes es la de la patria, el partido confia en los jovenes y es la decision y la voluntad del CC del PTC hacer que ellos pongan primero la placa en la puerta de la potencia prospera y enfatizo que les entregara otra vez que el partido encargo a los brigadistas la  construccion de la central.
					
					Dijo que al terminar la obra hasta el tiempo fijado debemos demostrar a todo el mundo que 70 anos de nuestro partido es la historia de haber dado prioridad a los jovenes y la de haber levantado la potencia de la juventud y finalizo prometiendo que cuando se termine la obra, vamos a organizar en el terreno la gran funcion de coro de los jovenes bajo su presencia y a tomar una foto de recuerdo tomando la central como fondo.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Jae Il y Jon Yong Nam.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, dia de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 20 un banquete en su sede diplomatica. 
					Fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Sin Hong Chol y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la sede diplomatica de Cuba.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el embajador cubano dijo que la gran vida del Presidente sirve de un modelo no solo del pueblo coreano sino tambien de los pueblos revolucionarios del mundo y agrego que el pueblo cubano no olvidara para siempre las hazanas del Presidente acumuladas en el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises.
					
					Prosiguio que el pueblo cubano presencia con admiracion la realidad de Corea que logra gran avance bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo en su discurso que es firme la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de desarrollar la amistad combativa y los lazos de solidaridad con Cuba preparados por los grandes Lideres.
					
					El pueblo coreano estara siempre como antes en la misma trinchera con el hermano pueblo cubano en la lucha comun por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo, finalizo.

articles.title: Daran ruina final a "poder" traidor con temperamento de 19 de abril, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Daran ruina final a "poder" traidor con temperamento de 19 de abril, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace 55 anos desde ahora en el Sur de Corea ocurrio el Levantamiento Popular de Abril que llevo a la ruina el "poder" traidor de Syngman Rhee.
					Este levantamiento fue la explosion del rencor e indignacion de los habitantes acumulados debido a la dominacion colonial de los imperialistas yanquis y sus lacayos durante 15 anos despues de la liberacion del pais.
					
					Igualmente devino la masiva resistencia antiyanqui y antifascista en que participaron unos millones de las amplias masas en toda la extension del territorio surcoreano.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Aunque transcurrio mas de medio siglo desde aquel levantamiento, todavia no se ha realizado el deseo de los rebeldes, lo cual se debe enteramente a la locura traidora de las fuerzas conservadoras proyanqui.
					
					Ahora el Sur de Corea retorna al periodo de la dictadura de "renovacion" del pasado.
					
					La gobernadora titere actual gana de mala fama como dictadora atroz que sigue la politica antipopular llena de insolencia y el egoismo sin prestar atencion a las voces de pueblo.
					
					Apenas en 2 anos y pico desde la toma de las fuerzas gobernantes actuales en el poder, se han agravado solo la confrontacion, la tension y el peligro de guerra nuclear entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					La realidad tragica de hoy llama a los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea a la lucha masiva por aniquilar a las fuerzas foraneas y traidoras sucediendo el espiritu de los participantes en el Levantamiento Popular de Abril.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos que mantienen vivos en el corazon el espiritu del 19 de abril, daran la ruina final con la resistencia masiva para la independencia antiyanqui, la democratizacion antidictatorial y la reunificacion de la patria a los reaccionarios de la historia que dan espalda a la epoca y la nacion.
